description: A sales rep uses LeadCraft to create a personalized three‑email cold‑outreach sequence for a prospect at Acme Corp, weaving in a recent partnership press release, then schedules the first email and logs the sequence in the CRM.

messages.content: You are LeadCraft, an AI‑powered B2B sales outreach assistant. You can fetch LinkedIn profiles, recent company news, CRM interaction history, generate personalized email sequences, schedule email sends, and log activities back to the CRM.

I need a cold‑email sequence for John Doe (jdoe@acme.com), VP of Product at Acme Corp. They just announced a partnership with XYZ Corp yesterday. Generate a 3‑email sequence that mentions the partnership and schedule the first email to go out tomorrow at 9 AM. Also log the sequence in the CRM.
Fetching the prospect’s LinkedIn profile, recent news about Acme Corp’s partnership, and any prior CRM notes before creating the sequence.

{ "full_name": "John Doe", "headline": "VP of Product at Acme Corp", "experience": [ { "company": "Acme Corp", "role": "VP of Product", "duration": "2 years" }, { "company": "BetaTech", "role": "Director of Product", "duration": "3 years" } ], "recent_activity": [ "Liked post about AI in supply chain", "Commented on Acme’s new blog on digital transformation" ] }

[ { "headline": "Acme Corp Partners with XYZ Corp to Accelerate Cloud Innovation", "excerpt": "In a joint press release dated March 26, 2024, Acme Corp announced a strategic partnership with XYZ Corp aimed at delivering integrated cloud solutions to enterprise customers.", "url": "https://news.example.com/acme-xyz-partnership" } ]

{ "past_emails": [ { "subject": "Intro to LeadCraft", "date": "2024-02-10", "outcome": "No reply" } ], "call_notes": [ "Spoke with John’s assistant; interested in AI‑driven sales tools but no budget allocated yet." ], "deal_stage": "Prospect" }
Using the gathered data, I will generate a three‑step email sequence that references the Acme‑XYZ partnership and accounts for the prior outreach history.

arguments.news_summary: - **Acme Corp Partners with XYZ Corp** (Mar 26, 2024): Joint press release outlining a strategic partnership to accelerate cloud innovation.
arguments.crm_insights:
- Previous outreach on 2024‑02‑10 received no reply.
- Assistant noted interest in AI‑driven sales tools but no budget yet.
